item.title: About
item.description: Hi thereüñê, my name is Hoang. I am interested in DevOps, technology, and smart home devices. I also enjoy outdoor games like football and throwing boomerangs. The main purpose of this blog is to archive the lessons I learn and help me remember what I did quickly.
